name: Hero of Fate
description:
Thanks for following Hero of Fate and getting the latest game news.
You can contact us by joining the community (https://discord.gg/X3tpnpXv)!





Hero of Fate is a cool and smooth "rougue" game with "survivor" as the core gameplay, on the basic of traditional "survivor" gameplay, we added the multi careers partners and the great beast system to fight with you together. Each battles can carry up 4 teammates and a angel, so you can experience 5 times the fun of rougue in the game!
At the same time, you can also play as different characters, experience a variety of different professional skills, build your own unique team of partners, and survive under the surrounded monsters, and you can also defeat powerful boss by discovering fate, get a variety of random angels to fight with you, and finally defeat the big boss!





Free to choose the characters to fight in the game, experience 8 special skill elements (Thunder, Wind, Ice, Fire, Earth, Poison, Holy, Dark), free to mix and match combinations of many different attacking skills, each match has a different effect of the battle skills, every time each character you choose to enter the game is a brand new feeling, and you can see the rich in the elements of the Rogue, just enjoy the fun of smooth!




There are more than a variety of angels with different styles and skills, waiting for you to discover!
They can fight with you, add buff, and give you more functional play choices!
In short, those angels are very strong! Awesome! They can fight! Resistant! Also can support!
And the types of angels are also various and colorful, such as: "Earl from Hell, Boneroma




Who says Roguelite gameplay is all about farm?
Random fate system in game hides lots of surprises you can’t image.

Every choice is a new experience;




Each choice represents a different ending;



Every choice will let you feel the choice of fate!

You can survive, or die, or sad, or happy, everything is chose by your own!
